meanings.definition: A traditional art form of the Kuna people of Panama, consisting of colorful geometric designs made with layers of fabric.
meanings.sent1: The molas displayed vibrant patterns sewn on fabric.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate molas hanging on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The molas seemed to dance with colors in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity bloomed like a field of molas in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The molas told stories through their intricate shapes and colors.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'mola', referring to multiple pieces of this type of artwork.
meanings.sent1: We collected various molas during our trip to Panama.
meanings.sent2: The museum showcased a collection of stunning molas.
meanings.sent3: The room was filled with molas, creating a colorful atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: Their house looked like a gallery with all the molas on display.
meanings.sent5: The market sold authentic molas crafted by skilled artisans.
